name: ERailroadVehicleCoupler
comment: Type of connections in the game.

name: AFGRailroadVehicle
comment: Base vehicle for all railroad vehicles. E.g. locomotives, wagons etc.

methods.name: UpdateAnimation
methods.comment: Update the animations for this vehicle, this is called after the whole train has been moved.

methods.name: GetRailroadVehicleMovementComponent
methods.comment: Get the railroad movement for this vehicle.

methods.name: GetTrain
methods.comment: Get the train this vehicle is part of.

methods.name: GetSlidingShoe
methods.comment: Get the sliding shoe if this vehicle consumes power.

methods.name: IsDocked
methods.comment: Is this vehicle docked to a station.

methods.name: IsOrientationReversed
methods.comment:
If this vehicles orientation is reversed in the train formation.
@return true if forward for this vehicle is not the same as the trains forward.

methods.name: IsCoupledAt
methods.comment:
@param at Coupler, valid values are 0 (front) and 1 (back).
@return the vehicle coupled at index.

methods.name: GetCoupledVehicleAt
methods.comment:
@param at Coupler, valid values are 0 (front) and 1 (back).
@return the vehicle coupled at index.

methods.name: GetTrackPosition
methods.comment: Get the track position for this vehicle.

methods.name: GetTrackGraphID
methods.comment: Get the track id this vehicle is on; -1 if the track is invalid.

methods.name: SetTrackPosition
methods.comment: Set the track position for this vehicle, be careful cause the actor and any coupled vehicles will not get moved.

properties.name: mTrain
properties.comment: The train this vehicle is part of, updated from the railroad subsystem

properties.name: mIsOrientationReversed
properties.comment: If this vehicle is reversed in the train formation.

properties.name: mTrackPosition
properties.comment: Where along the track is the train.
